channel.title: CVE Feed for HackerOne -- mqtt-packet node module
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HackerOne -- mqtt-packet node module

item.title: CVE-2016-10523|2024-09-17T02:15:35.059Z -- hackerone -- mqtt-packet%20node%20module
item.description: MQTT before 3.4.6 and 4.0.x before 4.0.5 allows specifically crafted MQTT packets to crash the application, making a DoS attack feasible with very little bandwidth.
